about_the_game:
Experience the suspense in the demo of What Lurks Inside, a multiplayer game where trust is fleeting and survival uncertain. This preview lets up to four players delve into a world of cooperation, betrayal, and survival. Discover who among you harbors a monstrous secret in this blend of strategy and deception.

Demo Highlights:

  • Shape-Shifting Threat: Play the tense game of suspicion. Any player could be the monster in disguise, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.
  • Challenging Goals: Survivors aim to destroy crucial research and escape, facing both AI threats and player-controlled monsters. Achieve missions to boost your score and survival chances.
  • Cunning Deception: As the creature, blend in and sabotage the survivors' escape plans without revealing your true identity.
  • Evolving Arena: Navigate through a facility with both fixed and dynamically changing environments, using or avoiding hazards to survive.
  • Survival Skills: Find weapons, rescue allies, or set traps and utilize quick travel as the creature to outwit or overpower your opponents.
  • Thrilling Multiplayer: Engage in a game where every session is a unique mix of role-play, strategy, and fast-paced action.

The demo of What Lurks Inside invites you to a world of paranoia and survival. Will you detect the menace lurking among you, or become the dominant predator? The fate of the game is in your hands – but remember, this is just a glimpse of the full adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: What Lurks Inside contains mutilated corpses, blood, and biological growths that look like flesh. You are also able to attack other players with melee weapons.
